descriptionEvent.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"\"Women And The Sea\" is an upcoming contemporary dance performance in development, creatively addressing the pressing issues of climate change and ocean pollution. Ethno Contemporary Ballet has received support for this project through a grant from The \"Jenny and Antti Wihuri Foundation\", secured on October 9, 2023. As the development continues, the production is actively seeking additional funding to realize its project. The performance aims to bring attention to ocean pollution and climate change through the unique lens of mythical creatures.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We are open to collaboration and would appreciate any support. Please don't hesitate to contact us via ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"mailto:ethno.contemporary.ballet@gmail.com"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"email","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
